content: I was hoping this article would actually breakdown the debate, providing actual reasons/details for each candidates case, instead is a fairly simply article tracking “moments.” An article should also analyze in actual critical depth, as to why certain people are promoting these candidates. Its seems like a lot of data analysts are promoting Harden and basing this on reasons of “efficiency.” But the underlining assumptions and what exactly is efficiency and the benefits of this and problems with measuring such things of efficiency on the basketball court are never actually mentioned/discussed/anlayzed. It appears as though theRinger has bought into this argument, mentioning Harden for MVP (consistently) under efficiency arguments, but I dont think the writers actually understand or have crtically engaged with what that actually implies.
